Guest Molecules.Mechanism: Facilitated transport via π-complexation with Ag+ and molecular sieving

Other Information.Additional Info: The immobilized Ag+ enhances thiophene selectivity and reduces pore size to permit rapid thiophene transport while impeding n-octane.

Guest Molecules.Mechanism: Size exclusion due to reduced pore size after Ag+ immobilization

Other Information.Additional Info: The effective pore size of 0.60 nm impedes the larger n-octane molecules from passing through the membrane.

Sieving Mechanism: Size exclusion at sub-nanometer scale facilitated by Ag+ immobilization

Other Information.Additional Info: The hybrid membrane exhibits superior separation performance due to the integration of facilitated transport and sieving mechanisms. The material also demonstrates enhanced thermostability and anti-swelling properties.
